extendedInfo.description: ABCBA: Bons Comptes Bons Amis(this means Good Accounts Good Friends in french)This is a group budget control application. It's goal is to ease the management of expenses in a group of friends.During holidays, roommate, or any event, expense management can be complicated. ABCBA will allow you to enter any expense done by members of a group, specifying who must participate. The application calculates automatically who owes to whom. No internet connection required. No need anymore to make a kitty, or to do money exchanges at each expense!To allow all group members to verify expense details, ABCBA can generate and share reports in different formats: PDF, Excel (XLS), email, SMS... Supports English, French and Italian. Special thanks to Carlo Pite for Italian translation!This free version is adequate in most of situations.Features:- Graphical interface designed to minimize user actions- Possibility to change who owes to whom according to affinities*- No internet connection required- Receipt scanner with powerful cropping and image processing- Icon customized for accounts and expense categories- Not only manage expenses but also refunds and prior debts- Possibility to customize the currency and amount precision for each account- Contact integration (name, picture, email addresses and phone number for reporting)- Generation and sharing/saving of PDF, Excel and text reports by email, sms, Drive, Dropbox, Evernote, etc...- Possibility to export/import accounts directly from Drive, Dropbox, SD card... (for backup or sharing)- Displays user friendly charts to ease understanding of accounts (PDF reports as well)

reviews.title: Good expense sharing app...  only lacking multiple currencies
reviews.comment: Great app to share expenses for families travelling together.  If features like handling multiple currencies & ability to convert all expenses to home currency for settling debts are added, it will be really great.
reviews.author: Sum Lim Ho

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Nice group budget control app. Totally recommend it
reviews.author: Bruno Cavalcante

reviews.title: Best Household Expense Splitting App in 100\'s
reviews.comment: This app is great. Easy to enter transactions. Allows you to split transactions both equally and unequally.  Also sorted transactions in date order.  Plus allows you to assign a category to each expense to monitor your spending type as a household, rather than just individually.  If only it would export to Excel it would be very close to perfect, but the summary PDF is very nice!
reviews.author: Fiona Whitby
